column2:
```r
# use the lm() with syntax lm(y~x1+x2+x3), summary() will output regression coefficients
lm.fit <- lm(mpg ~ cylinders + displacement + horsepower + weight + acceleration + year + origin, data = Auto)
summary(lm.fit)
```
